message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both enjoy the money.
Alice, let's be real. That first offer was insulting. I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you a third.  Take it or leave it, but time is money, literally.
Okay Bob, time is money. I'll sweeten the deal a bit. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'll come down a bit, but you need to meet me halfway. The clock is ticking.
Bob, let's be sensible.  This is a fair split that gives us both a good chunk of the money.  Don't get greedy now.
Alice, this is getting painful.  I'm compromising again, but this is it.  Accept this offer or we both lose.
Bob, this is it.  We're running out of time, and this is the most fair deal you'll get.  Take it and we both win.
